column2: RP_CIPSIP : Start vacuum hold evacuation timer
RP_CIPSIP : Initiate Mx and MMFLx CIP Unit Operations
RP_CIPSIP : Set Mx and MMFLx Hygiene Status to CLEAN
RP_CIPSIP : Initiate Unit Operations for evacuation
RP_CIPSIP : Initiate MX and MMFLx SIP Operations
RP_CIPSIP : Mx to open steam trap valve for Unit Operation SIP
RP_CIPSIP : Low MX temperature during SIP
RP_CIPSIP : MX and MMFLx SIP complete
RP_CIPSIP : Start MX Drain valve pulse timer
RP_CIPSIP : Pulse time wait between sets of pulses
RP_CIPSIP : MX HPCA blowing and steaming complete
RP_CIPSIP : Wait for MX SIP Unit Operation to complete
